tweet: Our power plants have already implemented technology to remove mercury and other air toxins from their emissions so this won't save them money. The only thing it will do is harm our children.

Today 32 of my colleagues joined me in calling on the EPA to stop weakening the Mercury and Air Toxics Standards (MATS). I came to Congress to protect our environment for children. pic.twitter.com/6jM7tA9OBr
...and put himself above the law. I have said all along that we all deserve to know what happened. I am glad to see we are moving forward in a fair, transparent way. No one is above the law. 2/2

Right now Part B only covers care for serious conditions and people who are at a high risk for them. It doesn't cover yearly eye exams or access to glasses or contact lenses. Routine vision care should be covered under Medicare.
Today I introduced a bill that would expand Medicare Part B coverage to routine vision care with @RepOHalleran, @RepSlotkin, and @RepDelBene. pic.twitter.com/narafwQSIB

Today I joined over 350 of my colleagues from both sides of the aisle to oppose the President's decision to withdraw American troops from Syria. The Kurds are our allies and abandoning our allies is un-American. This decision is dangerous and jeopardizes our national security.

But it is incumbent on all of us to get one to help prevent the flu from spreading to those who are immunocompromised or too young. Check with your local pharmacy to see if they are offering flu shots. And veterans, you can get a flu shot for free at all VA Puget Sound locations.

I got my flu shot yesterday at local Issaquah pharmacy Bartell's. Getting the shot was quick and easy. Now is a great time to get a flu shot. It is especially important for vulnerable populations to get one. #VaccinesWork pic.twitter.com/TwV1GuTAHY

Teens who start using these medications often find them at home or at their friends’ homes. Don’t give them that opportunity. If a family member is using, get help and get opiates out of the house. And keep Narcan at home. These are powerfully addictive and lethal substances.

Please - sit with your children and talk with them about the dangers of drugs in general. And talk with them about how deadly these pills are when laced with fentanyl - something you can’t see, smell, or taste. You don’t know it is there until it is too late.

This is devastating. We parents in Sammamish and Issaquah mourn with the parents of these two teens, as this could have happened to any of our children. The opioid epidemic touches every one of our lives. https://twitter.com/Q13FOX/status/1179684258895552512 …

I just introduced a bill with @DrPhilRoe to stop this from happening by requiring health plan providers to swiftly update their website when they are told there is incorrect information on it, saving money and headaches. https://www.auburn-reporter.com/news/schrier-roe-introduce-bill-to-ensure-health-provider-directories-are-updated/ …

Have you ever tried to look up a phone number for a doctor on your health plan provider website only for it not to be there? Or worse, have you gone to a doctor the website said was in-network, but you were billed with out-of-network charges?
